title: I'm sorry to bother you,but I have some questions...
body:
The question occurred on train stage,and the error is listed as below:
start training...



Training epoch: 1
   8000/1803460 [....................] - ETA: 18:53:36 - epoch: 1 - iter: 1000 - precision: 0.0744 - recall: 0.0399loading error: /home/zhangxl004/place2/val_256/Places365_val_00000001.jpgTraceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 41, in __getitem__
    item = self.load_item(index)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 71, in load_item
    mask = self.load_mask(img, index)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 139, in load_mask
    mask_index = random.randint(0, len(self.mask_data) - 1)
  File "/usr/anaconda2/envs/py3/lib/python3.6/random.py", line 221, in randint
    return self.randrange(a, b+1)
  File "/usr/anaconda2/envs/py3/lib/python3.6/random.py", line 199, in randrange
    raise ValueError("empty range for randrange() (%d,%d, %d)" % (istart, istop, width))
ValueError: empty range for randrange() (0,0, 0)

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 2, in <module>
    main(mode=1)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/main.py", line 56, in main
    model.train()
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/edge_connect.py", line 197, in train
    self.sample()
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/edge_connect.py", line 348, in sample
    items = next(self.sample_iterator)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 199, in create_iterator
    for item in sample_loader:
  File "/home/zhangxl004/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 615, in __next__
    batch = self.collate_fn([self.dataset[i] for i in indices])
  File "/home/zhangxl004/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 615, in <listcomp>
    batch = self.collate_fn([self.dataset[i] for i in indices])
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 44, in __getitem__
    item = self.load_item(0)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 71, in load_item
    mask = self.load_mask(img, index)
  File "/home/zhangxl004/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 139, in load_mask
    mask_index = random.randint(0, len(self.mask_data) - 1)
  File "/usr/anaconda2/envs/py3/lib/python3.6/random.py", line 221, in randint
    return self.randrange(a, b+1)
  File "/usr/anaconda2/envs/py3/lib/python3.6/random.py", line 199, in randrange
    raise ValueError("empty range for randrange() (%d,%d, %d)" % (istart, istop, width))
ValueError: empty range for randrange() (0,0, 0)
I would very appreciate if you could help me,thank you!
